messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Skinny-dipping
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ain t even gonna go down *that* path... Shyrley You laugh at me because I m different. I laugh at you because you are all the same.
messages.messageBody:
On 16 Sep 02, at 17:47, MO Milligans wrote:

> At 11:13 AM 9/16/02 -0400, you wrote:
>
> >I haven't gone skinny-dipping for years. Was it fun?
> >
> >Shyrley
> ==
> It was very, uh, *bracing*. LOL. It was fun, but parts <wink> of me
> may never be seen again. LOL
>
> Todd
>
I ain't even gonna go down *that* path...

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Skinny-dipping
messages.msgSnippet: ... == It was very, uh, *bracing*. LOL. It was fun, but parts  of me may never be seen again. LOL Todd If you choose not to decide, you still have made
messages.messageBody:

>I haven't gone skinny-dipping for years. Was it fun?
>

==
It was very, uh, *bracing*. LOL. It was fun, but parts <wink> of me may
never be seen again. LOL

Todd

"If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.
I will choose Free will" -Rush (and Todd)
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] nekkid... Shyrley

I haven't gone skinny-dipping for years. Was it fun?

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: swimming-naked-in-the-pool story
messages.msgSnippet: ... == Um, I won t be able to join the real-life party in SC, so could you just tell me the story now? I won t tell anyone else.  Todd -- If you choose
messages.messageBody:
At 02:30 PM 9/14/02 -0700, you wrote:

>I have a real funny swimming-naked-in-the-pool story, though,
>that I'll tell you when I see you! (Gee, now that I think of it, I have a
>few!)
>
>Marji
==
Um, I won't be able to join the real-life party in SC, so could you just
tell me the story now? I won't tell anyone else. <eg>

Todd

--
"If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.
I will choose Free will" -Rush (and Todd)

messages.subject: SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/14/02 9:48:15 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/14/02 9:48:15 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I ran it by dh but he didn't think he could get time off and I don't know
if I could handle that long of a road trip by myself. >>

Well, I don't know how long of a road trip it is for ya, but there are plenty
of us huffing it up there on our own with children in tow.
I'm coming with all four of them and no dh. So come anyway!!

Ren

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: Marji, I would love to but I don t think its going to happen.  I ran it by dh but he didn t think he could get time off and I don t know if I could handle that
messages.messageBody:
Marji,
I would love to but I don't think its going to happen. I ran it by dh but he didn't think he could get time off and I don't know if I could handle that long of a road trip by myself. Maybe the next conference that comes up I can go to.
Thanks for asking anyway!
Kelli T
marji wrote:At 06:26 9/14/02 -0700, you wrote:
> Kelli Traaseth wrote:
>Now, your guys wouldn't happen to be going to SC via Minnesota would you?
>Kelli T

Now, taking a trip like *that* (NY to Minnesota to South Carolina) would be
a real adventure!! That actually sounds like fun!

Are you planning to travel there from Minnesota?

Marji

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ll certainly be bringing alcohol. So, party in my room then. Nekkid is optional. Shyrley who no longer has purple hair but dyed it black on thursday You
messages.messageBody:
On 14 Sep 02, at 16:50, starsuncloud@... wrote:

> In a message dated 9/14/02 2:13:45 PM Central Daylight Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> << Do we really have to wear pyjama's to the pyjama party? I usually
> sleep nekkid... >>
>
> Well, you'd never be forgotten Shyrley....me thinks you wouldn't be
> easy to forget anyway. But nekkid? Yup, I'D certainly never forget
> that!! The tequila party is in your room? I'll be there, with some
> hair dye or something....
>
> Ren, the original
>
I'll certainly be bringing alcohol.
So, party in my room then. Nekkid is optional.

Shyrley who no longer has purple hair but dyed it black on thursday




"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... I don t want to scare you, Ren, but in and around our house clothing is entirely optional.  Don t worry, though:  I have the damn good sense to leave my
messages.messageBody:
At 16:50 9/14/02 -0400, Ren wrote:
>In a message dated 9/14/02 2:13:45 PM Central Daylight Time,
>Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
><< Do we really have to wear pyjama's to the pyjama party? I usually
> sleep nekkid... >>
>
>Well, you'd never be forgotten Shyrley....me thinks you wouldn't be easy to
>forget anyway. But nekkid? Yup, I'D certainly never forget that!!
>The tequila party is in your room? I'll be there, with some hair dye or
>something....
>
>Ren, the original

I don't want to scare you, Ren, but in and around our house clothing is
entirely optional. Don't worry, though: I have the damn good sense to
leave my clothes ON because I don't want to frighten anyone, but Liam and
his friends have the damn good sense to go around "nekkid" when that's
called for. I have a real funny swimming-naked-in-the-pool story, though,
that I'll tell you when I see you! (Gee, now that I think of it, I have a
few!)

Thanks for your very generous offer, Shyrley! I just can't wait to meet
you folks!!

Marji






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/14/02 2:13:45 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/14/02 2:13:45 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Do we really have to wear pyjama's to the pyjama party? I usually
sleep nekkid... >>

Well, you'd never be forgotten Shyrley....me thinks you wouldn't be easy to
forget anyway. But nekkid? Yup, I'D certainly never forget that!!
The tequila party is in your room? I'll be there, with some hair dye or
something....

Ren, the original

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference

messages.messageBody:

>
> Now, your guys wouldn't happen to be going to SC via Minnesota would

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... I got a room reservation too. I got an idea. Ren and her kids n my kids n Marji s kids in one room. Me n tequila and a party in the other...... Seriously,
messages.messageBody:
On 13 Sep 02, at 23:08, starsuncloud@... wrote:

> In a message dated 9/13/02 9:23:23 PM Central Daylight Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> << With that in mind, we are wondering if anyone might be interested
> in
> sharing a room with us. That would make this whole thing a lot more
> doable for us.
> >>
>
> I was JUST thinking I should find a roomate to keep costs down Marji!!
> But you'd be with me and FOUR kids.....is that doable for ya? Not much
> privacy, but we'd save money. I'm totally up for that. email me.
>
> Ren, already with a room reservation
>
I got a room reservation too. I got an idea. Ren and her kids n my
kids n Marji's kids in one room.
Me n tequila and a party in the other......

Seriously, I'll volunteer my room for one night if you want Marji. I've
got 3 kids but they can sleep onna floor with sleeping bags.

Do we really have to wear pyjama's to the pyjama party? I usually
sleep nekkid...

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: I am looking for someone to stay overnight with on the way up to the conference. I am hoping for someone to put us up on the night of the 10th and the 14th (on
messages.messageBody:
I am looking for someone to stay overnight with on the way up to the
conference. I am hoping for someone to put us up on the night of the 10th and
the 14th (on the way back) in the Atlanta area.
If you think you can handle myself and four children, please email me! Thanks,
Ren, the original

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SOS conference
messages.msgSnippet: oops....you guys..... Kelli T Kelli Traaseth wrote: Now,  your guys wouldn t happen to be going to SC via Minnesota would you? Kelli T ... Me, too!  Who needs
messages.messageBody:
oops....you guys.....
Kelli T

Kelli Traaseth wrote:
Now, your guys wouldn't happen to be going to SC via Minnesota would you?
Kelli T
marji wrote:At 23:08 9/13/02 -0400, Ren wrote:

>Not much privacy, but we'd save money. I'm totally up for that.


Me, too! Who needs privacy, anyway?! We have privacy all the rest of the
time; this will be a total blast! Count me in!

Marji, who's jumping up and down for joy 'cause now she can go to the
conference!

<< With that in mind, we are wondering if anyone might be interested in
sharing a room with us. That would make this whole thing a lot more doable
